id_table_1.caption: Comparison with other diagnostic video datasets from four aspects: whether they are video-language datasets, whether they are open-domain, whether they target temporal understanding ability, and whether they contain a fine-grained evaluation of model abilities.
id_table_1.table:
Dataset video-language open-domain temporal fine-grained
Temporal Dataset [65] ✗ ✓ ✓ ✗
CATER [26] ✗ ✗ ✓ ✗
CLEVRER [85] ✓ ✗ ✓ ✓
SSv2-label [41] ✓ ✗ ✓ ✗
Contrast set [59] ✓ ✓ ✗ ✗
VITATECS (Ours) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

id_table_12.caption: The first three rows are macro precision, recall, and F1-score of the fine-tuned filter model in each iteration. Iteration 0 corresponds to the filter model fine-tuned using the manually initialized exemplars alone. The fourth row is the number of valid positive samples after human revision in each iteration. The last row is the size of exemplar sets for generation and filtering in each iteration.

id_table_13.caption: Summarization of all evaluation results. For Singularity, “-t” denotes the temporal version and “-5m/-17m” denotes the size of pre-training data. For CLIP-based models, “-meanP” (non-temporal) and “-seqTransf” (temporal) denote the type of temporal aggregation module.
id_table_13.table:
Positive Direction a person is connecting something to system
a person is disconnecting something from system
Intensity person is driving his black car fast on the street
person is driving his black car slow on the street
Sequence a person slides down a sandy path and falls down
a person falls down and slides down a sandy path
Localization a man gets shot in the face
a man gets shot in the chest
Compositionality there is a man shooting other people in a corridor
there is a man being shot in a corridor
Type a man cooks burgers and bacon on a grill
a man eats burgers and bacon on a grill
N/A Direction a young man is running very fast on a treadmill while being supported by a harness
Intensity then ham is place on the bread
Sequence a man throws an ax from overhead towards a target
Localization a video game car is driving recklessly
Compositionality a student in class smashes his forehead on the desk two times
Type a scenic view is available through a camera while a man narrates about the camera
Negative Entailment a little girl does gymnastics
a little girl is doing gymnastics
Implausible persons are attending a class with laptops
laptops are attending a class with persons
Static a man is driving a black car
a man is driving a white car
Negation cartoon people are eating at a restaurant
cartoon people are not eating at a restaurant
Excessive difference a soldier is speaking to a superior person in a movie
a soldier is watching a movie

id_table_14.caption: Examples from the initial positive, negative and N/A exemplar sets.
id_table_14.table:
Aspect Instruction
Direction Reverse the direction of changes to object status.
Intensity Modify the speed or intensity of the actions/events.
Sequence Change the temporal order or the number of occurrences of the actions/events.
Localization Change the location where the actions/events take place on the frame.
Compositionality Change the composition of persons/objects with actions/events.
Type Modify the type of actions.
